___________________________________________________________________________________


Check how was complete coverage of the FIFA World Cup Brazil 2014 By Channel SporTV. With all the Goals, Penalty Bids and competition.

SporTV stands in the transmission of the World Cup in Brazil. The pay channel SporTV broadcast all games of the World Cup in Brazil and finished the event heavily strengthened. The station was the one that was involved in the coverage of the World, with a better transmission than up, the Band and the Globo broadcast television channels.

SporTV 24 hours live programming during the World Cup. Coverage of the 2014 World Champion on Channel will have new programs, invited commentators and 'studio glass' in the beautiful countryside of Rio SporTV prepares a more than special coverage of World Cup 2014. Programming live for 24 hours, new programs, commentators guests and a "studio glass' in one of the most beautiful landscapes of Rio de Janeiro are some of the attractions of the coverage of Channel Champion will then transmit the 64 World Cup games and everything about the games in the 12 host cities and the rest of country.

To show all the details of the largest event ever held in Brazil, SporTV will feature a team of 600 professionals, with 430 accredited for venues and press centers.

One of the news coverage will be installing a 'studio glass' on Fiscal Island, located in Guanabara Bay and is home to a historic building of the nineteenth century, administered by the Navy. With a beautiful view of Rio de Janeiro in the background, studio, swivel and ball format, will be the basis of three daily programs.


Kyojuu Yamashi. World Cup FIFA Brasil 2014. 20/07/2014.
